overview: Among the black population of the Oaxacan coast, Juana and Magdalena share their life with Neri although they know that it hurts them. In addition, Juana's terminal disease will give Magdalena clarity to resume her life.

production_companies.name: Fondo para la Producción Cinematográfica de Calidad

tagline: There are Mexicans who are invisible
title: Black Mexicans
